text:
Su Tseng-chang (; born 28 July 1947) is a Taiwanese politician. He is the current premier of the Republic of China. He was the chairman of the Democratic Progressive Party from 2012 to 2014.
Su was Premier of the Republic of China from 2006 to 2007 and was Chief of Staff to President Chen Shui-bian in 2004.

annotations.surface_form: Premier of the Republic of China
